articles.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs verdict live updates: Hip-hop mogul denied bail after being found guilty on 2 of 5 counts, acquitted of sex trafficking and racketeering charges - Yahoo
articles.description: The 12-member panel reached a verdict on Wednesday, nearly two months after jury selection began in the case.
articles.content:
Sean "Diddy" Combs will remain in jail while he awaits sentencing for his conviction on two counts of prostitution-related offenses, a judge decided Wednesday evening.

articles.title: ‘The Last Of Us’ Co-Creator Neil Druckmann To Step Back Creatively From HBO Series Ahead Of Season 3 - Deadline
articles.description: Neil Druckmann will take a step back creatively from The Last of Us on HBO ahead of Season 3
articles.content:
There is a big creative shakeup happening on HBO‘s The Last of Us as Season 3 gets underway.
